description.narrative: This activity (Programme Funds) is a component of Advocacy Fund - Trade Window reported by FCDO, with a funding type of 'Procurement of Services' and a budget of £11,455,358. This component benefits Developing countries, unspecified, and works in the following sector(s): Multilateral trade negotiations. , with the following implementing partners: Crown Agents Limited, KPMG LLP. The start date is 09-09-2011 and the end date is 31-12-2016.

owner-org.narrative: UK - Foreign, Commonwealth and Development Office (FCDO)

mailing-address.narrative: Public Enquiry Point, Abercrombie House, Eaglesham Road, East Kilbride, Glasgow G75 8EA
